notes_text: Cannabis was legal in Comoros between January 1975 and May 1978, when president Ali Soilih legalized cannabis consumption among other measures.
notes: Cannabis was legal in Comoros between January 1975 and May 1978, when president Ali Soilih legalized cannabis consumption among other measures.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Comoros}} Cannabis was legal in Comoros between January 1975 and May 1978, when president [[Ali Soilih]] legalized cannabis consumption among other measures.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.niyel.net/docs/Dossier_1_fr.pdf|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20110723222625/http://www.niyel.net/docs/Dossier_1_fr.pdf|title=Dossiers sur les 30 Chefs d'Etat ou de Gouvernements tués|archive-date=23 July 2011}}</ref><ref name="French1997">{{cite journal|last1=French|first1=Howard|title=The Mercenary Position|journal=Transition |issue=73|year=1997 |pages=110–121|issn=0041-1191|doi=10.2307/2935448 |jstor = 2935448 }}</ref>
